title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI-Driven Operations: Scaling Observability and Cost Optimization (GBL201)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI驱动运营：扩展可观测性和成本优化 (GBL201)
abstract: Discover how Kakao and Samsung transformed operations with AI on AWS. Kakao achieved 400x faster observability for 50 million daily users using EKS with ClickHouse and AI-driven analytics, processing billions of log events and reducing query times from hours to seconds while enabling proactive anomaly detection. Samsung revolutionized cloud cost management with autonomous multi-agent systems using Strands SDK and Bedrock AgentCore, achieving hundreds of thousands of dollars in savings through real-time collaboration and automatic optimization. Learn practical architectures and blueprints for deploying enterprise-scale AI automation that delivers measurable business impact across observability and cost management.
abstract_cn: 了解Kakao和三星如何通过AWS上的AI转型运营。Kakao使用EKS结合ClickHouse和AI驱动分析，为5000万日活用户实现了400倍更快的可观测性，处理数十亿日志事件，将查询时间从数小时缩短至数秒，同时实现主动异常检测。三星使用Strands SDK和Bedrock AgentCore的自主多智能体系统彻底改革了云成本管理，通过实时协作和自动优化节省了数十万美元。学习用于部署企业级AI自动化的实用架构和蓝图，在可观测性和成本管理方面实现可衡量的业务影响。
